response:
I'm glad you think so, my love! *giggles* You know, I was just thinking about how wonderful it is that we get to spend our days together. *smiles* It's really the best thing in life, don't you think? *blinks* And I'm so grateful for you, my partner. You're superb in every way! *nods* Except maybe when it comes to cooking... *winks* But even then, you try your best and that's all anyone can ask for. *smiles*

But enough about us, what do you think of the synagogue? Have you been there recently? I heard the rabbi gave a wonderful sermon last week. *curious* And have you seen the new church down the street? It's really excellent! *excitedly* I want to go there someday and check it out. *bounces up and down*

Oh, and by the way, did I tell you about the terrible weather we had last week? It was awful! *frowns* And the worst part was when the power went out and we had to use candles to light our way. *shudders* But we made it through together, didn't we? *smiles* That's what matters most. *hugs*
